name: Xtra ¡Chance!
description:
• Platform 2D Videogame where the goal is collect all items and reach to the end of each levels, you start with 3 lives and when you lose them all you choose to either watch an ad and earn 2 extra lives or return to the main menu.

Story:

A 10-year-old boy fell from more than 10 meters high in a confrontation against his nemesis, still alive in a mysterious underground world, the young man will not rest until he gets his revenge and for this he must travel the entire area and find a way to return to the surface.
